name: Holiday Inn Express Minot South

reviews.title: Excellent experience
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed here for one night in August. I chose it because it was close to all of the major shopping areas, but was more than pleasantly suprised at what a great facility it is. It is a fairly new hotel, (it still had that fresh, new smell). The staff was friendly, courteous and helpful. Our room was immaculately clean, as was the rest of the hotel. It was decorated nicely and modernly. There was no skimping on anything,.the pillows were perfect, in fact there were four on the bed, two labelled soft, two labelled firm(embroidered right onto the pillowcases), the bed itself was firm, but very comfortable(easily comparable to those in more expensive hotels). There were ample towels that were thick and plush, the shower/tub had a curved rod that fit right around the top of the enclosure, so that there was no water leaks or drafts possible. The showerhead was extra wide so that even with the flow control you felt like you had ample water. The lighting in the bathroom was very good; perfect for makeup application (which is rare in most hotels). The price was more than reasonable. My only negative point is that the air conditioning/heating unit was a bit noisy when it cut in during the night. We will definitely stay here again.

aka: Holiday Inn Express Minot South Hotel
description: Our Comfortable Minot, ND Hotel Offers Convenience and Relaxation Ideally located just off Highway 83, our comfortable and convenient Minot hotel provides easy access to the Minot International Airport (MOT), so that you can go to and from your destinations quickly and easily. For an afternoon of recreation, our Minot hotel guests can visit the Dakota Air Museum, Roosevelt Park and Zoo or the Dakota Square Mall. Other local Minot attractions include downtown Minot for shopping and the Coleman Taube Museum that hosts a number of visual art events year-round. Also, the Scandinavian Heritage Center is home to the annual Norsk Hostfest festival, the largest North American Scandinavian festival and a part of the Scandinavian Heritage Park. Business travelers will appreciate our Minot, North Dakota accommodations near so many corporate offices. Wilbur-Ellis, Trinity Hospital, Minot State University, Minot Air Force Base, Burlington Northern Santa Fe Railroad, ING and SYKES Enterprises. Farstad Oil, Dakota Skies Bio Diesel, Farmers Union Oil and Tri-B Oil are all located less than four miles from our hotel in Minot. During your stay in Minot, you can enjoy choice amenities such as free high-speed Internet access, a heated indoor pool and whirlpool, a 24-hour Business Center and a well-equipped Fitness Center. Be sure to check out our excellent Minot hotel deals and rates as you plan your next trip to Minot, North Dakota.
